text:
Luann de Lesseps may be taking some "time to herself" in Switzerland in the wake of the news that she's divorcing Tom D'Agostino, but there is one celebrity superfan who is still shaken up by the news. That person is Difficult People star Julie Klausner.



"I am sitting shiva and I would appreciate a fruit basket -- at the very least from you [Andy]," she shared on Monday's Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen. "And my heart is scrambled eggs a la Francaise."

She then dished out some sage advice for The Real Housewives of New York City mom in the wake of the split. "Luann, all you need to do is look inside of a mirror and you're gonna see the person that's gonna get you through this -- her name is Luann," Luann's one-time Difficult People co-star said. "And I'm not concerned about you at all."

Oh, but there's more! To find out Julie's theory about why Tom appeals to so many women -- and to see what the WWHL audience thinks about their split, check out the clip above. And take a trip down memory lane, by watching the video below.
